member.name: T:CacheManager.Serialization.Json.GzJsonCacheSerializer
member.summary: Implements the ICacheSerializer contract using Newtonsoft.Json and the loseless compression.

member.name: M:CacheManager.Serialization.Json.GzJsonCacheSerializer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CacheManager.Serialization.Json.GzJsonCacheSerializer.#ctor(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. With this overload the settings for de-/serialization can be set independently.
member.param: The settings which should be used during serialization.
The settings which should be used during deserialization.

member.name: M:CacheManager.Serialization.Json.GzJsonCacheSerializer.Compression(System.Byte[])
member.param: The data which should be compressed.

member.name: M:CacheManager.Serialization.Json.GzJsonCacheSerializer.Decompression(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decompress the into the base serialized data.
member.param: The data which should be decompressed.

member.name: T:CacheManager.Serialization.Json.JsonCacheSerializer
member.summary: Implements the ICacheSerializer contract using Newtonsoft.Json.

member.name: M:CacheManager.Serialization.Json.JsonCacheSerializer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CacheManager.Serialization.Json.JsonCacheSerializer.#ctor(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. With this overload the settings for de-/serialization can be set independently.
member.param: The settings which should be used during serialization.
The settings which should be used during deserialization.

member.name: P:CacheManager.Serialization.Json.JsonCacheSerializer.DeserializationSettings
member.summary: Gets the settings which should be used during deserialization. If nothing is specified the default will be used.

member.name: P:CacheManager.Serialization.Json.JsonCacheSerializer.SerializationSettings
member.summary: Gets the settings which should be used during serialization. If nothing is specified the default will be used.

member.summary: Extensions for the configuration builder for the Newtonsoft.Json based ICacheSerializer.

The settings to be used during deserialization.
